title: FS: T201 Brown SGC 20 still available!

posts.post_title: FS: T201 Brown SGC 20 still available!
posts.post_content:
A few more up for grabs with more likely to be added as I sift through my collection this week.

T201 Brown SGC 20 = $55
T205 McGraw (Red SC) P = $SOLD!
T206 Flick (SC 150) P = $SOLD!

Let me know which one you need! Thanks!

Jimi
Bump due to price reductions.  Have at it!  :)
